author: GameTimePA.com report
title: BOYS SOCCER: Monday's roundup
text:
— 0 
First half — (M) Jake Boehme, 1st min., (M) Patrick Keefer, asst. Boehme, 6th, (M) Nic Culler, asst. Boehme, 9th, (M) Boehme, asst. Ethan Barclay, 14th, (M) Barclay, asst. Landon Richards, 22nd, (M) Chad Bunch, 27th, (SF) Chase Varner, asst. Jacob Murray, 32nd. 
Second half — (M) Keefer, 43rd, (M) Boehme, 52nd, (M) Barclay, 60th, (SF) Varner, 66th, (M) Boehme, asst. Barclay, 70th, (M) Marcel Schneidereit, 76th, (SF) Ethan Golden, asst. Cam McCray, 77th. 
Shots — SF 8, McC 30; Corner kicks — SF 1, McC 12; Saves — SF 15 (Collin Bard), McC 4 (Hunter Souders). 
SHALOM CHRISTIAN 4, BROADFORDING 1 >> Broadfording tied the game 1-1 early in the first half, but Shalom Christian scored the final three goals to take a 4-1 Mason-Dixon Christian Conference victory. 
"The first half was kind of rough – we weren't getting good shots on goal and weren't communicating," Flames coach Chris Lehman said. "But I was proud of how the guys responded in the second half – they worked together a lot better." 
Jonah Stains and Cyrus Lehman (penalty kick) put Shalom (11-4-1, 11-1-1 MDCC) ahead in the first half, and Chase Martin and Peter Livermore increased the lead in the latter half. Martin also had an assist. Shalom Christian 4, Broadfording 1 Shalom Christian
